extension.name: System - Mail Links to Contact Enhanced
extension.author: Douglas Machado

field.name: parse-plain-text-emails
field.label: Parse Plain text emails
field.description: Create a link to Contact Enhanced even when there is no mailto link for emails

field.name: template
field.label: Use Template
field.description: Some templates set a width to the content container, therefore you can choose another template. Recommended in these cases is ja_purity

field.name: avoid_menuitems
field.label: Avoid Menu items
field.description: Plugin will not be visible for the selected menu items

field.name: avoid_articles
field.label: Avoid Articles
field.description: Plugin will NOT be executed in the selected articles
field.query: SELECT `title` AS `text`, `id` AS `value` FROM #__content WHERE state= '1' ORDER BY title ASC

field.name: avoid_components
field.label: Avoid Components
field.description: Plugin will not be executed for the selected components
field.query: SELECT `name` AS `text`, `element` AS `value` FROM #__extensions WHERE type= 'component' AND extension_id NOT IN (1,3,5,6,7,9,10,11,12,13,14,15,16,18,20,23,24) ORDER BY name ASC
